modal_heading_deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this provider's account?
modal_text_deactivate:
The provider will no longer be able to adjust their availability, enroll into campaigns, suggest consultations to clients or appear into client searches.

Note: The provider will still be able to access their account, view their past consultations, and conduct already scheduled consultations.
modal_heading_activate: Are you sure you want to activate this provider's account?
modal_text_activate: The provider will be able to adjust their availability, enroll into campaigns, suggest consultations to clients and appear into client searches.
name: Name
